sn18.1:4.2: ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
sn18.1:4.3: Atha kho āyasmā rāhulo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
sn18.1:4.5: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā rāhulo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn18.1:4.6: “sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetu, yamahaṃ bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvā eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
sn18.1:5.1: “Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, rāhula, cakkhuṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā”ti?
sn18.1:5.3: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vā taṃ sukhaṃ vā”ti?
sn18.1:5.5: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, kallaṃ nu taṃ samanupassituṃ:
sn18.1:6.11: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vā taṃ sukhaṃ vā”ti?
sn18.1:6.13: “Yaṃ panāniccaṃ dukkhaṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, kallaṃ nu taṃ samanupassituṃ:
sn18.1:7.1: “Evaṃ passaṃ, rāhula, sutavā ariyasāvako cakkhusmimpi nibbindati … pe …
sn18.1:7.10: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā’ti pajānātī”ti.
